entries.title: Architecture and authority clarified
entries.summary: Documented the authoritative runtime, Desktop Admin control plane, and downstream read-only web dashboard while laying path configuration groundwork.
details: Runtime repository is affirmed as the sole authority for state, telemetry, and exports across the two-repo architecture.
WinForms Desktop Admin runs locally with filesystem access, process control, and path management responsibilities.
Web dashboard remains a read-only consumer of exported JSON and carries no process or filesystem authority.
Path configuration groundwork continues without changing runtime execution behaviors.

entries.title: Alpha metadata refresh
entries.summary: Version metadata promoted to v0.2.2-alpha with build 2025.03 while preserving prior release history.
details: Runtime metadata and exports now advertise v0.2.2-alpha.
Changelog history remains intact with prior entries pinned to v0.2.1-alpha.
Dashboard about views should surface the refreshed version string.

entries.title: Runtime development resumed
entries.summary: Runtime execution resumed with Rumble paused and YouTube/Twitch prioritized for ingestion.
details: Explicit platform state tracking introduced (ACTIVE, PAUSED, DISABLED).
Rumble marked as PAUSED with telemetry preserved and scheduler skip logic.
YouTube and Twitch stabilized for continued chat ingestion development.

entries.title: Runtime development suspended
entries.summary: Runtime execution and ingestion development has been suspended.
details: External platform interfaces failed to provide stable, supportable ingestion paths.
Runtime behavior could not be made deterministic enough for safe automation.
No further runtime changes are planned until external conditions materially change.

entries.title: Quota enforcement hardened
entries.summary: Daily quota enforcement stabilized across platforms.
